snippet.title: Dwelling |Teaser Trailer Unveiled | Official Teaser trailer from Kodextra Studios
snippet.description:
Welcome to "Dwelling," a spine-chilling first-person horror game brought to you by Kodextra Studios (Kodextra Solutions (OPC) Pvt Ltd).

🔦 About the Game:
Step into a world where every shadow conceals a secret, and every corner hides a nightmare. In "Dwelling," you'll explore eerie environments, solve mind-bending puzzles, and uncover the dark history that haunts this forsaken place. Are you brave enough to face the horrors that await?

Terrorizing Your dreams from 7th July 2024.

💀 Features:

Immersive first-person gameplay
Hauntingly detailed environments
Puzzles that challenge your wits and nerves
A chilling storyline that will keep you on the edge of your seat
Discover the terror. Face your fears. Survive the nightmare.

Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more updates!

#kodextrastudios #kodextrasolutions #DwellingGame #HorrorGame #GamingTeaser #LibraryScene #mystery #horrorgaming #horrorshorts #kodekraftacademy 
@IGN @IGNIndia @outsidexbox @GameTrailers @gamespot @mob-xgame @GameSpotTrailers @MathChief @enfant-terrible @gameranxTV @GameV
